alert.note: Alert for Butler; Chase; Harvey; Marion; McPherson; Reno; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 1:10AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern McPherson, eastern Reno, northern Sedgwick, Harvey, southwestern Chase, northwestern Butler and Marion Counties through 215 AM CDT... At 110 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Hillsboro to near Haven. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wichita, Hutchinson, Newton, Andover, Park City, Valley Center, Bel Aire, Goddard, Hesston, Maize, Hillsboro, Halstead, Marion, North Newton, Moundridge, Sedgwick, Colwich, Haven, Peabody and Burrton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 7 and 48. Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 77 and 89. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Butler; Chase; Harvey; Marion; McPherson; Reno; Sedgwick
